item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Welcome to my personal website. I’m Steve Rhoton, and this is where I share my thoughts, projects, and experiences.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post on my new Hugo-powered website. I’m excited to share more content soon!
